attributes.action: Give amnesty to all zimbabweans in the Uk and grant them refugee status.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the collapse of the elections in Zimbabwe and the level of violence perpertrated by Mugabe on the citizens it would be a breach of Human Rights to return any overstayers and therefore give them the means to engage in lawful employment to support theirselfs as genuine refugees
